precis:
PROMOTION of the following OFFICERS of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police:
.
   OFFICER                                          NEW RANK
   ------------------------------------------       ----------------------
1. Chief Supt. Joseph René Roger CHARBONNEAU        Assistant Commissioner
2. Inspector Terrance Errett ELLIOTT                Superintendent
